title: Flower Hill - Searching for the base font in this logo
content:
This logo was obviously hand adjusted, but I was wondering if there is a base font in use here, and if so, what it might be. Thanks in advance.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419204438im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/70551.gif)
author: anonymous
